text: Basi putani ngondo (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) petala lya Allah, ngankukanganisyidwa (ya ŵandu ŵane) ikaŵeje mwasyene, soni mwachisyani ŵakulupilila, mwine Allah kuŵa nkugachiga machili ga ngondo ga aŵala ŵakanile, sano Allah ni Jwakupundanganya nnope machili, soni Jwakupundanganya nnope pakupeleka ipotesi
